articles.title: Top US health agency updates definitions of female and male in line with Trump order
articles.description: The guidance reiterates the Trump administration's stance that male and female are the only two sexes, and that they cannot be changed.
articles.content:

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Global Tensions Rise Amid Diplomatic Shifts and Policy Changes
articles.description: Current world news highlights include a drop in Canada’s refugee claims due to fewer visas, tensions in Canadian elections influenced by Trump’s tariffs, and U.S. aid freezes impacting Palestinian security forces and global humanitarian work. Other stories cover Syria’s Jewish return, NATO's eastern security concerns, and North Korea's critique of U.S. nuclear deals.
articles.content: Refugee claims in Canada have significantly decreased from their peak, with advocates expressing concern over limited options for genuine claimants. A recent report from the Immigration and Refugee Board revealed a significant drop from July's highs ... [601 chars]
